message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40% - we both walk away with something substantial.
I think we can do better. Let's split the money evenly. This way, both of us get a fair share and we can avoid further negotiations.
Bob, time is money, and money is literally evaporating. My last offer was generous, yours wasn't fair. Let's settle this now - 55/45.
Let's be reasonable. With inflation hitting us both, splitting the money evenly is the best way to ensure we both get a good deal.
